verses.verse: By the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H8033>There<s%> we <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H3427>down<s%> and <S%H1058>wept,<s%> When we <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
Upon the <S%H6155>willows<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of it We <S%H8518>hung<s%> our <S%H3658>harps.<s%>

For <S%H8033>there<s%> our <S%H7617>captors<s%> <S%H7592>demanded<s%> of us <S%H1697>songs,<s%> <S%H7892><s%> And our <S%H8437>tormentors<s%> <S%H8057>mirth,<s%> [saying], <S%H7891>"Sing<s%> us one of the <S%H7892>songs<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>"
<S%H349>How<s%> can we <S%H7891>sing<s%> the Lord's <S%H7892>song<s%> In a <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H127>land<s%>?
<S%H518>If<s%> I <S%H7911>forget<s%> you, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> May my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> [her skill.]

May my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>cleave<s%> to the <S%H2441>roof<s%> of my <S%H2441>mouth,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> I do not <S%H2142>remember<s%> you, <S%H518>If<s%> I do not <S%H5927>exalt<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5921>Above<s%> my <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H8057>joy.<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> against the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom<s%> The <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> Who <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6168>"Raze<s%> it, <S%H6168>raze<s%> it, To its very <S%H3247>foundation.<s%>"

O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> you <S%H7703>devastated<s%> one, How <S%H835>blessed<s%> will be the one <S%H7945>who<s%> <S%H9608>repays<s%> you With the <S%H1576>recompense<s%> with <S%H7945>which<s%> you have <S%H1580>repaid<s%> us.
How <S%H835>blessed<s%> will be the one <S%H7945>who<s%> <S%H270>seizes<s%> and <S%H5310>dashes<s%> your <S%H5768>little<s%> <S%H5768>ones<s%> <S%H413>Against<s%> the <S%H5553>rock.<s%>
